scene.name: intro
scene.line: They had a kid with them.
scene.option: I'm sure he's in good hands.

scene.name: recordings
scene.line: I bet he'd be into it. It could be like a game: I'll play him a turkey call at half-speed, and make him guess what kind of animal it is.

scene.name: friend
scene.line: He's hanging out with an old dog, an old man, and some kind of telephone technician or something.
I just feel sorry for him, is all ...

scene.name: decision
scene.option: Fine, fine. You can make a friend. Briefly.

scene.name: end-stop
scene.line: You're the best. And, hey, maybe if they're not busy they can fill some seats at the gig. You know if no one's there Harry'll try and bilk us on our fee.
